# Open CSV file writer for storing GFP data import csv file = open("gfp.csv", 'wb') writer = csv.writer(file, delimiter = ';') writer.writerow(["iteration", "totalTime", "id", "gfp", "gfp/volume"])
# Program code def call(object, simulation, dt): writer.writerow([simulation.iteration, simulation.totalTime, object.id, object.moleculeCount("GFP"), object.moleculeCount("GFP") / object.volume])
